channel.title: Any one have the code for ::pickup

item.title: Any one have the code for ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @Devilwabad1 Devilwabad1
item.description:
@Devilwabad1 wrote:

2 errors this time
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (newItemID <= 10000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}

Read full topic
item.source: Any one have the code for ::pickup

item.title: Any one have the code for ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

delete your old command, add this under command.trim;

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (newItemID <= 10000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

item.title: Any one have the code for ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

[quote=“Xblad3rX, post:9, topic:145735”][quote author=1234ideclareathumbwar link=topic=199538.msg1775480#msg1775480 date=1190553671]
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {

change that to

           if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {

[/quote] i dont think he was “referring to silabs”
but i think my command worked :D.

one last thing, what kind of source doesnt have the pickup command? a complety empty one…[/quote]

he could have deleted on accident…

item.dc:creator: @Devilwabad1 Devilwabad1
item.description:
@Devilwabad1 wrote:

i got 5 errors
Compiling…
client.java:10649: illegal start of type
} else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase {
^
client.java:10649: expected
} else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase {
^
client.java:10649: illegal start of type
} else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase {
^
client.java:10653: illegal start of expression
if (newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >=
0) {
^
client.java:10653: illegal start of expression
if (newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >=
0) {
^
5 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Any one have the code for ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

[quote=“Xblad3rX, post:4, topic:145735”]sorry if this code doesnt work, i whiped it up fast.

client.java is modified.

} else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

im not sure where to add it.
you have the odd-est source.

go into client.java and search for other commands…

once you find a command add that under a “}”

i really am un-sercure about that source, its pretty messed up to be honest.

~blader[/quote]

Put it in the commands section so search for kick and it might take you to the commands area!

Read full topic

@Xblad3rX wrote:

ok, enter your server.

type -

::pickup (item ID) (Ammount of that item you want/need)

http://dnd.no-ip.org/output.txt - silabs code link

  • to find the regular codes look at the following picture.

click help-
then item-IDs

~blader
